description:
Another way to optimize your grip and glide. On this all-round classic binding, you pick your binding position depending on snow conditions. It's low profile design keeps you close to the snow for a more sensitive feel for the trail. When snow conditions are hard to predict, this is one more way to fine tune your ski's performance.

  • Integrated heel-plate guideridge improves power transfer
  • Forward positions increase grip and rearward positions increase glide
  • Binding shifts easily with a single button, even with gloves on
  • Ergonomic race lever opens widely and closes securely
  • Compatible with skis with premounted Prolink Shift plates (PSP). Mounting plate not included
  • Ideal for skis with integrated skins
  • Turnamic and NNN-compatible
name: Salomon Prolink Shift Pro Classic Bindings
